tr.td: World Generic Map Service with EuroGlobalMap data for Europe
This is a generic map service of the world including datasets of worldwide coverage (VMAP0, ESRI ArcWorld, USGS GTOPO) and EuroGlobalMap for areas covering Europe (copyright EuroGeographics)
VMAP0, ArcWorld, EGM, GTOPO, Europe, EuroGeographics, EuroGlobalMap

The Commission is authorized to disseminate geographic data, derived geographic data and other derived products as web map services on the Intranet of the Commission as well as on the Internet, if the source is acknowledged
